document.full_text: in what has become a familiar ritual over the past two weeks, jurors in the insider trading trial of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam told the judge they needed more time to weigh the evidence.
document.title: no decision yet from raj rajaratnam jury's ponderings
lines_and_colors: in what has become a familiar ritual over the past two weeks, jurors in the insider trading trial of hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam told the judge they needed more time to weigh the evidence.
